verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Early one morning, Just as the sun was rising, I heard a maid sing, In the valley below.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Oh, don't deceive me, Oh, never leave me, How could you use A poor maiden so?

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Remember the vows, That you made to your Mary, Remember the bower, Where you vowed to be true,

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Thus sang the poor maiden, Her sorrows bewailing, Thus sang the poor maid, In the valley below.
